head.title: COVID-19 Family Letters - Jeffco Public Schools

meta.content: Jeffco Public Schools has been providing educational excellence since 1950. Our mission is to provide a quality education that prepares all children for a successful future.

a.title: Update Regarding COVID-19 Test Result Notifications

div.a: Update Regarding COVID-19 Test Result Notifications
div.div: Moving forward, Jeffco Public Schools will not be notifying school communities of positive COVID-19 test results.
div.a: Read More About Update Regarding COVID-19 Test Result Notifications

a.title: Governor Polis Orders School Closure Extension through April 17

div.a: Governor Polis Orders School Closure Extension through April 17
div.div: To help mitigate the spread of the COVID-19 virus in Colorado, on Wednesday, March 18, 2020, Governor Jared Polis ordered that all public and private schools across the state suspend in-person learning from March 23 to April 17.
div.a: Read More About Governor Polis Orders School Closure Extension through April 17

div.span: Jeffco Public Schools has been providing educational excellence since 1950. Our mission is to provide a quality education that prepares all children for a successful future.
div.div: Title IX requires school districts to designate at least one employee as their Title IX Coordinator. Jeffco Public Schools has designated District Title IX Coordinator, Kristin Moulton.
